content.query:
select top 100 ItemId
              ,upper(DataAreaId) as DataAreaId
              ,coalesce(Name , 'Unknown') as Name
              ,CostCenter, CostCenterValue
  from raw.InventTable it
    left outer join raw.EcoResProductTranslation n on n.Product = it.Product and LanguageId = 'EN-US'
    left outer join raw.DimensionAttributeValueSet d on d.RecId = it.DefaultDimension


select * from raw.DimensionAttributeValueSet d inner join raw.InventTable it on it.DefaultDimension = d.RecId

SELECT T1.DISPLAYVALUE AS DISPLAYVALUE, T1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET AS DEFAULTDIMENSION, T1.PARTITION AS PARTITION, T1.RECID AS RECID, T2.ENTITYINSTANCE AS ENTITYINSTANCE, T2.PARTITION AS PARTITION#2, T3.REPORTCOLUMNNAME AS REPORTCOLUMNNAME, T3.RECID AS DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEID, T3.BACKINGENTITYTYPE AS BACKINGENTITYTYPE, T3.KEYATTRIBUTE AS KEYATTRIBUTE, T3.NAMEATTRIBUTE AS NAMEATTRIBUTE, T3.NAME AS NAME, T3.PARTITION AS PARTITION#3 
FROM DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM T1 
CROSS JOIN DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE T2 
CROSS JOIN DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE T3 
WHERE((( T1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE  =  T2.RECID)  AND ( T1.PARTITION  =  T2.PARTITION))  AND (( T2.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE  =  T3.RECID)  AND ( T2.PARTITION  =  T3.PARTITION)))

select t.name, c.name 
      from sys.all_columns c 
             inner join 
           sys.tables t 
             on t.object_id = c.object_id 
     where t.name = 'DimensionAttributeValueSet'


select distinct CostCenter, CostCenterValue from raw.DimensionAttributeValueSet
select * from raw.DimensionFinancialTag
select * from raw.FinancialTagCategory

select
    gje.AccountingDate as AccountingDate,
    gje.DocumentDate as DocumentDate,
    gje.DocumentNumber as DocumentNumber,
	gje.JournalNumber as JournalNumber,
	davc.DisplayValue as LedgerDimension,
	gjae.MainAccount as MainAccount_FK,
    davc.CostCenter as CostCenter_FK,
    davc.Department as Department_FK,
    davc.BusinessUnit as BusinessUnit_FK,
    davc.ItemGroup as ItemGroup_FK,
	l.RECID as LegalEntity_FK,
    gjae.ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT as [Amount(AccountingCurrency)],
    l.ACCOUNTINGCURRENCY as AccountingCurrency,
	gjae.REPORTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT as [Amount(ReportingCurrency)],
	l.REPORTINGCURRENCY as ReportingCurrency,
	gjae.TransactionCurrencyAmount as [Amount(TransactionCurrency)],
	gjae.TransactionCurrencyCode as TransactionCurrency,
	gje.SubLedgerVoucher as SubLedgerVoucher
from raw.GeneralJournalAccountEntry gjae
join raw.GeneralJournalEntry gje on gjae.GeneralJournalEntry = gje.RECID
join raw.Ledger l on gje.Ledger = l.RECID
join raw.DimensionAttributeValueCombination davc on gjae.LedgerDimension = davc.RECID
